pr_title: DROOLS-4993: [DMN Designer] Code Completion - add keywords

timeline.message: Moving FEEL reserved keyword list to dmn-client
Highlight FEEL reserved keywords during typing

timeline.bodyText:
Does this mean we previously offered in autocompletion bigger snippet, e.g. if then else but now we will offer just single words if, then and else separately?
Or the row notation is just tricky and no change, but amount of words.
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.author: vpellegrino

timeline.bodyText: here it shouldn't be keyword rather than function?
timeline.author: jomarko

timeline.bodyText: also here maybe variable instead of function?
timeline.author: jomarko

timeline.bodyText: is it fine we do not use whole FEEL_RESERVED_KEYWORDS
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText: yes it is only a sample of data. Do you think we need to put all reserved keywords there?
